SELECT a.room_no, b.user_no, b.room_name FROM ( SELECT * FROM room_list WHERE user_no = #{userNo }) a INNER JOIN room b ON a.room_no = b.room_no

mapper.select: SELECT c.*, m.user_id, f.chat_file_no, f.chat_origin_name FROM chat c left JOIN member m ON c.user_no = m.user_no left JOIN chat_file f ON c.chat_no = f.chat_no WHERE c.chat_room_no = #{chatRoomNo } AND c.chat_no >= (SELECT MAX(chat_no) FROM chat b WHERE b.chat_room_no = #{chatRoomNo } AND b.user_no = #{userNo } AND b.chat_content = '입장하셨습니다.' AND b.chat_no > (SELECT NVL(MAX(chat_no),0) FROM chat a WHERE a.chat_room_no = #{chatRoomNo } AND a.user_no = #{userNo } AND a.chat_content = '나가셨습니다.')) ORDER BY c.chat_no
SELECT MAX(chat_no) chat_no FROM chat WHERE chat_room_no = #{chatRoomNo }
